title: Plat Team: LF Mid & Jgl
body:
Hello! We are looking for a mid and jungle to join our competitive plat team. We will be hosting try outs starting at 11 PM Est Today. We will have 3 set practice days a week as we are going to be playing in a tournament within a few weeks. We are looking for only people who are serious and willing to commit to practice times and being apart of the team. Please fill out the information below and I will add you in game if you seem like a good fit. Thanks! 

IGN:
AGE:
Rank:
Role: 
Top 5 Champs: 
Reason you wanna join our team:
Can you shotcall: 
working mic and discord:

replies.body:
IGN: NoNetflixNoChill
AGE: 21
Rank: p1/2(varies)
Role: I fill in ranked but I guess mid/adc
Top 5 Champs: lux, ori, corki(mid), lulu(mid), fizz/ cait, ashe, lucian, vayne, ez
Reason you wanna join our team: I just want a more competitive feel. I used to play collegiate as well as coach it but im taking a break from that for now
Can you shotcall: if im on a less active role(such as if I fill as support/jung then I can do it pretty well) but other than that only a little like specific macrocalls
working mic and discord: yes(Freshavacado#6284)

IGN: LL Graves LL
AGE: 20 in the navy
Rank: g2, will be plat before the weekend is over, peaked at d3
Role: Jg
Top 5 Champs: Graves, Rek'Sai, Zac, Ekko, Xin Zhao
Reason you wanna join our team: To join a team that likes to have fun and that strive to be the best they can be.
Can you shotcall: Yes
working mic and discord: Yes to both

IGN: Nëãr
AGE: 18 just grad highschool
Rank:Plat 5 100lp in promos for Plat 4
Role: JG
Top 5 Champs: Usually whatever is top tier in meta or hyper carry junglers (xin, eve, ww, sej, graves, yi)
Reason you wanna join our team: just looking for a competitive team to join currently
Can you shotcall: yes
working mic and discord: yes

IGN: dotrix
AGE: 21
Rank: p4
Role: mid
Top 5 Champs: viktor ori azir syndra and I'm tied with malz zed and vlad for 5th
Reason you wanna join our team: Just want a team to compete in flex and tournaments with
Can you shotcall: Yes but I'm not the best at it
working mic and discord: Yup
